name: Higher rate taxpayer
description: Single person earning £80,000 - higher rate tax band

sources.description: Verified using online UK tax calculator for 2025/26
sources.notes: Personal allowance: £12,570, Taxable: £67,430, Income tax: £7,486 (basic) + £11,946 (higher 40%) = £19,432, NI: £2,994 (8%) + £617 (2%) = £3,611, Total deductions: £23,043, Net: £56,957
